headline: Digital Realty Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend for Common and Preferred Stock
summary: Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), the largest global provider of cloud- and carrier-neutral data center, colocation and interconnection solutions, announced today its board of directors has authorized quarterly cash dividends for common and preferred stock for the third quarter of 2025.
